name: Cops And Robbers VR
description:
The police got you good,partner. They've got you surrounded just as you left the gas station, can you hear the sirens getting closer?

You're done for, partner.
...Or are you?

Get behind the wheel and weave through cacti and rocks to stay away from the police as much as you can in this arcade racer.

The better a driver you become, the longer you can stay outside the law's reach, the higher the score.

Please note: This game requires a bluetooth controller that has a D-Pad and of which one of the buttons corresponds to the number 1.

An example of such controller is the one I used during development (https://i.ebayimg.com/images/g/IbsAAOSwrklVE8dh/s-l300.jpg)

Please consider if this game is good for you as it is very motion heavy and it may be uncomfortable to play.
